author: dennisl
msg: [MCHANGES-34] e.printStackTrace() instead of log on xml parsing error

author: jmsnell
msg: Let the JSONWriter support writing out Document instances

author: jmsnell
msg: More wierdness with the PushbackInputStream.  If we don't call available() within read(byte[],int,int), the amount of bytes
read off some streams may be incorrect, which leads to an incorrect pushback, breaking the xml parse.

author: pcl
msg: moved to raw 'openjpa.*' property prefix instead of 'org.apache.openjpa.*'; implemented system to allow multiple property prefixes for configurations without relaxing any of the current validations
